org.trellisldp.api

Interface BinaryService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultBinaryService

    public interface BinaryService
    The BinaryService provides methods for retrieving, modifying and checking the validity of binary content.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  BinaryService.MultipartUpload
      A multipart upload container
      static interface  BinaryService.Resolver
      A blob resolver, used by the BinaryService

    • Method Detail

      • getContent

        default Optional<InputStream> getContent(String partition,
                                         IRI identifier)
        Get the content of the binary object
        Parameters:
        partition - the partition to use
        identifier - an identifier used for locating the binary object
        Returns:
        the content

      • exists

        default Boolean exists(String partition,
                       IRI identifier)
        Test whether a binary object exists at the given URI
        Parameters:
        partition - the partition to use
        identifier - the binary object identifier
        Returns:
        whether the binary object exists

        stream - the content

                        IRI identifier,

        Set the content for a binary object
        Parameters:

        identifier - the binary object identifier
        stream - the content
        metadata - any user metadata

      • purgeContent

        default void purgeContent(String partition,
                          IRI identifier)
        Purge the content from its corresponding datastore
        Parameters:
        partition - the partition to use
        identifier - the binary object identifier

      • calculateDigest

        default Optional<String> calculateDigest(String partition,
                                         IRI identifier,
                                         String algorithm)
        Calculate the digest for a binary object
        Parameters:
        partition - the partition to use
        identifier - the identifier
        algorithm - the algorithm
        Returns:
        the digest

        Note: as per RFC 3230, the digest value is calculated over the entire resource, not just the HTTP payload.

      • supportedAlgorithms

        Set<String> supportedAlgorithms()
        Get a list of supported algorithms
        Returns:
        the supported digest algorithms

      • getResolver

        Optional<BinaryService.Resolver> getResolver(IRI identifier)
        Get the resolver for the given identifier
        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier
        Returns:
        a binary object resolver

      • getResolverForPartition

        Optional<BinaryService.Resolver> getResolverForPartition(String partition)
        Get the default resolver for the given partition
        Parameters:
        partition - the partition name
        Returns:
        a binary object resolver

      • digest

        Optional<String> digest(String algorithm,
                        InputStream stream)
        Get the digest for an input stream
        Parameters:
        algorithm - the algorithm to use
        stream - the input stream
        Returns:
        a string representation of the digest

        Note: the digest likely uses the base64 encoding, but the specific encoding is defined for each algorithm at https://www.iana.org/assignments/http-dig-alg/http-dig-alg.xhtml

      • getIdentifierSupplier

        Supplier<String> getIdentifierSupplier(String partition)
        An identifier supplier
        Parameters:
        partition - the partition to use
        Returns:
        a supplier of identifiers for new resources
